---
title: "Monitoring pruzkumu"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(formr)
library(here)

api_secret <- read_csv(here("private_data","api_secret.csv"), col_types = cols(
  `Client ID` = col_character(),
  `Client Secret` = col_character()
))
formr_api_access_token(client_id = api_secret$id, client_secret = api_secret$secret)
```


```{r}
request <-
        list(
                "run[name]" = 'roverskypruzkum',
                "surveys[seberozvoj_rozcestnik]" = "kolik_casu"
)

odpovedi_kolik_casu <- formr_api_results(request)
```
